Alex’s jaw would have hit the floor if he wasn’t being held so high above it. This once sweet innocent girl he had babysat for countless times, just threatened to give him away like an unwanted toy or shrink him even further to the point where he’d be sleeping in Barbie’s Dreamhouse. The newfound power was going to her head, and he knew if he didn’t put a stop to it soon, he’d find himself in very serious trouble. But for now he had to pick and choose his fights, and this was definitely not the time to fight.

“Um I’d actually love to sleep with you Holly,” Alex said, backpedaling hard at her threat, “I think that’s a… great idea.”

Holly’s face went from serious to overjoyed in an instant as she hugged Alex to her bare chest into a tight hug.

“Yay!” she squealed as she squeezed him tight, “Perfect! Then let’s get to bed!”

With that Holly walked back to her bedroom, the both of you stark naked. She walked in and effortlessly pulled back the covers and placed Alex down on the bed before sliding under the covers herself. She reached out for him and he reluctantly crawled towards her as she pulled him closer and right against her body.

“Goodnight Alex,” she whispered above him before pulling him right up to her body and wrapping her arms around him sealing him in for the night, “We are gonna have so much fun tomorrow!”

‘Can’t wait,’ Alex thinks sarcastically as the two fall asleep with him in her arms.
